column5: 2018 | ------National ------Social Security------ News------ | | ------0 | 0 minutes ago------According to the Apsara Authority
column6: “The 2018 Equinox is coming soon!” on September 23
column7: 2018.------The Apsara Authority posted a message on Facebook that “According to the researchers of the Apsara Authority Research and Archives Center of the Apsara Authority
column9: 2018 the Autumnal Equinox will occur. This is the moment the Sun crosses the celestial equator – the imaginary line in the sky above Earth’s Equator – from north to south------The Apsara Authority added
column10: “As a special event at Angkor Wat
column12: the sun will rise at the center of Angkor Wat early in the morning. On Sept. 23
column13: the sun will rise to the middle of the center
column14: which can be seen from the central gate of the West Gate from 5.30-7am”.------The Apsara Authority hopes that the weather will be good for taking pictures of the sunrise with the beautiful Angkor Wat.------https://nokorthom.com/2018/09/%E1%9E%96%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%9A%E1%9F%87%E1%9E%A2%E1%9E%B6%E1%9E%91%E1%9E%B7%E1%9E%8F%E1%9F%92%E1%9E%99%E1%9E%9A%E1%9F%87%E1%9E%85%E1%9F%86%E1%9E%96%E1%9E%B8%E1%9E%9B%E1%9E%BE%E1%9E%80%E1%9F%86%E1%9E%96/
